programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: This newsmagazine investigates intriguing crime and justice cases that touch on all aspects of the human experience. Over its long run, the show has helped exonerate wrongly convicted people, driven the reopening -- and resolution -- of cold cases, and changed numerous lives. CBS News correspondents offer an in-depth look into each story, with the emphasis on solving the mystery at its heart. The program and its team have earned critical acclaim, including multiple Emmy, Peabody and Edward R. Murrow Awards.

programme.title: The Interrogation Tapes: A Special Edition of 20/20
programme.desc: A look at some of the most compelling criminal cases in recent history through the lens of interrogations, unveiling the tricks of the trade detectives use to coax confessions from suspects. As the stories unfold, experts in the science and tactics of interrogations, along with ABC News legal correspondents Ryan Smith, Brian Buckmire and Jami Floyd, go inside this supercharged space, unpacking dynamic, tense and vulnerable moments at the heart of each case. Audiences gain insights into the special techniques employed by different interrogators, how some use the physical space, methods employed when looking for clues, analysis of a suspect's speech and body language, and how this all can culminate in the truth.

programme.title: The Legend of 5 Mile Cave
programme.desc: A boy enchanted with tales from the Old West unlocks a mystery that could save their family farm. While his widowed mother struggles to avoid foreclosure, a mysterious stranger arrives looking for a room to rent. A bond with the boy grows as the drifter recounts breathtaking stories of Shooter Green, a legendary gunslinger accused of Arizona's biggest gold robbery. The truth is revealed, along with the secret of the drifter's past when a crooked lawman appears, hot on the trail of the stolen gold. Past and present collide in this tale of action, adventure and drama. Stars Adam Baldwin (The Last Ship, Full Metal Jacket, The Patriot), Jeremy Sumpter (Peter Pan, Soul Surfer), Jill Wagner (Braven, Christmas Cookies), and Jet Jurgensmeyer (Last Man Standing, American Sniper).

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Throughout the years, our friendships have been forged in deer camps across the country, and this week is a continuation of some of those times. programme.title: Storytellers

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: The bond between and parent and child can grow in many ways, but nothing compares to the bond shared when hunting. programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We find ourselves fishing with Troy from Lonestar Beer. Not only is Troy a great friend he is also a big supporter of Hunters Extravaganza. We get to catch up in the offseason and spend a day on the water discussing future events and reflect on what all Texas has to offer.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: Every year, hunters from across the country flock to various parts of Texas to extend their hunting season. This year, our friends from Struttinbuck did just the same. Matt and Clede make the long drive to Del Rio to hunt South Texas bucks right on the Mexico border.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: In 2010, Amberly Snyder's life changed forever when an accident left her paralyzed from the waist-down. Her comeback story not unlike something you'd see in a movie…in fact it inspired one. Disabled Outdoorsmen USA contacted TTHA and set up this hunt and we were fortunate enough to be able to capture just some of Amberly's story and her harvest of a beautiful Axis buck at the G2 Ranch in the spring of 2022.

programme.title: Storytellers

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: This spring, our crew was able to dive into some turkey hunting at the G2 ranch with long time TTHA Members Mike Reeber and Dan Marcasol. programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: My First Signs: See and Sign With Baby
programme.desc: As babies grow, their eye-hand coordination begins to improve as their ability to interact with their surroundings blossoms. It is the perfect time for My First Signs, A playful introduction to 20 common words and phrases from baby's world -- including ''mommy'', ''daddy'' and ''I love you'' -- both Spoken and in Sign Language.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Babies love animals, and now you can bring animals from the seven continents home to your baby. Meet dozens of exotic animals including Asian pandas, Australian kangaroos and Arctic snow monkeys...all filmed in their beautiful, natural habitats. Rhythms and songs inspired by faraway lands have been orchestrated especially for little ears and encourage your baby to sing, dance and play to the world beats. You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Discovering Shapes: Circles, Squares, and More
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Meet fascinating creatures from across the globe and learn to run, hop, and crawl like your favorite animal friends. Dance and sing along to discover animal names and the native habitats of the world's most unique creatures. See real-life images of lions and zebras on the African savannah, then learn animal names through repetition and narration, or simply watch your favorite animals play!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby's First Sounds: Discoveries for Little Ears
programme.desc: Perhaps the sweetest sounds you'll ever hear are the babbles and coos that one day become ma-ma, da-da and I love you. Besides being music to your ears, these baby steps of language change everything as your little one discovers an exciting, powerful new way of relating to the world! Baby's First Sounds invites both of you to share these memorable moments: those precious ''firsts'' that come around once in your baby's lifetime.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Da Vinci: From Head to Toe
programme.desc: From the day their eyes open, babies begin to observe new things around the world and about themselves. Baby Da Vinci From Head to Toe presents them with a playful and interactive introduction to the human body in three languages -- English, Spanish, and French. With a whimsical blend of adorable puppets, real children and animals and famous works of art, this captivating program also features upbeat classical music.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies grow and change, so does the landscape around them. From fiery red leaves to falling snowflakes from flowers in bloom to fireworks in July, every season of the year has its own special magic just waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Discover the exciting world of shapes and colors! Learn about the primary colors red, yellow, and blue with real-life imagery of animals and objects. Explore colors like purple, orange, and green and see artwork by Van Gogh! Discover the circles, squares, and triangles that surround us in everyday life, and introduce baby to the world of visual arts as children and artists create their own work!

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby Lullaby takes your baby on a soothing journey with classical lullabies by Bach, Brahms and Mozart. Enjoy relaxing ocean waves, sweet puppet shows and tranquil images. From fun time to rest time, Baby Lullaby is the perfect way to spend special time with your baby.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry and Huck turn the Baby Berrykins' favorite fairy tale, "The Littlest Berrykin," into a comedy play. They pitch it to director Plum and the assembled cast and crew using a large storybook. As Huck and Blueberry narrate the story, we push in on the book and its illustrations transition into animation. In the story, the King and Queen of the Berry Patch (played by Huck and Blueberry) are retiring to the tropics.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the "retrieve" part of the activity-as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: To convince the dance-averse Huckleberry to attend the big masquerade ball at the dog park, Blueberry promises she'll stay by his side the whole evening and make sure he doesn't have to dance. But as the day of the ball dawns, Blueberry awakens with a bad cold. She doesn't know how to tell Huck that she can't go to the ball. Lemon and Raspberry misinterpret her sniffles, thinking she's so heartbroken to be disappointing Huck that she's crying!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry is disappointed in the girls' lack of enthusiasm for the Patti Persimmon mystery novels, her favorite book series. She finds herself missing the company of her fellow Persimmon fan Huckleberry, and thinks up a great way to get him to visit. She invites Huck to co-write a story with her to submit to an online mystery magazine.. Huck eagerly accepts and comes for a visit.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Disappearing Dog Show
programme.desc: When Huckleberry and Blueberry's Patti Persimmon-style mystery story is rejected by an online mystery magazine, Blueberry and Huck have to come up with a new way to raise support for Huckleberry's Hotel for Homeless Pets back in Berry Big City. Strawberry suggests they hold a big dog show! Plum makes over-ambitious plans to display talents that her dog does not quite have, trying to teach him complicated dance routines.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. Charmed by their reaction, Strawberry suggests that the girls do a "berrytale play" for the kids, sort of a "Story Time On Stage." Plum volunteers to direct it. She envisions a small, simple production-until she hears about a gigantic production of "Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins" that's a smash hit in Berry Big City.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Foods that start with Q
programme.desc: Can you name a food that starts with Q? Avery makes Quiche with Chef Jean-Jacques Texier. Lily visits a sheep farm to find out about a creamy, little known cheese called Quark. Back in the kitchen, they take on Matt's Quirky Quesadilla challenge.

programme.title: Foods for The Brain
programme.desc: Lily knows the smartest way to start the day is with a good breakfast, and meets Chef Donna Dooher to make Green Eggs and Ham. Avery visits a centre that researches fish. Matt keeps score as the two face-off with blueberry and strawberry deserts that help build brain power.

programme.title: The Itchy Tag
programme.desc: At school, Sid and his friends explore and learn about the different textures around them: smooth, soft, bumpy and itchy...like his shirt tag!

programme.title: What's That Smell?
programme.desc: But the yummy scent is quickly taken over by a different smell when baby brother Zeke and his stinky diaper enter Sid's room. At school, Sid learns how smells travel through the air and arrive inside the nose.

programme.title: The Princess and the Dragon
programme.desc: When a 7 year old princess gets transported to a magical world where she befriends a Dragon, she sets to find out a secret mirror that can help her reconnect with her mother.

programme.title: The Berry Bitty Dance Disaster
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some “groove booties” programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Doggie Dance No-Show
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apple's groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pup's obvious dislike of performing in public. It's up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesn't want to do.

programme.title: Foods that Grow
programme.desc: Ready Set Grow! With a garden's worth of greenery, Avery grills up a batch of veggie burgers. Lily heads into the field to unravela mystery: how do greenhouses help veggies grow in winter (Psst. The secret is right under your feet). Then our duo discovers a funny thing about tomatoes – they're actually fruit! And avocados are actually berries! Turn them into dip and discover a delicious treat.

programme.title: Foods that Stick
programme.desc: Lily's coming unglued! Can Matt help her find the fix for chicken fingers that stick to the pan? Avery tackles the art of making Japanese sticky rice at a sushi restaurant. But, when the octopus sushi gives him the willies, will he be able to stick to the task? Our hosts really bond when they compete to see who can make the stickiest snacks. With all this fun, you'll want to stick around!

programme.title: Grandma's Glasses
programme.desc: Sid explores his sense of vision, and discovers that even though Grandma's glasses make things look blurry to him, they make things look clear to her.

programme.title: Too Much Noise!
programme.desc: Maybe he has super powers! Sid explores his sense of hearing, and discovers that sounds travel through the air and into our ears. So it turns out Sid doesn't have super powers, he was just blocking sound waves from entering his ears!

programme.title: Sky's the Limit
programme.desc: When a storm causes a giant boulder to cut off Berry Bitty City's water supply, Strawberry and the girls face the possibility of having to move away from their homes. With the help of Mr. Longface Caterpillar, the girls set out on an adventure to save their town.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.desc: Everyone is frightened because some visiting birds keep trying to sit on their heads. According to Chirpee, the birds just enjoy sitting on people's heads. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Gina accidentally broke Felicia's house, leaving Felicia homeless. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Thunderbell is sad because he's discovered a new fruit and eaten all of it. Now there's none left and he'll never be able to eat that fruit again. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a farmer. // Thunderbell has a terrible tummy ache. Rainbow Ruby becomes a Microbiologist to find out why Thunderbell is sick. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling takes Rainbow Ruby to Ellie's cabin where she meets mischievous baby stars that fell from the sky. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. It took a long time for the village friends to prepare an amazing painting for the mayor. Unfortunately, Thunderbell accidentally destroyed the painting while delivering it.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: At Your Service // A Hard Rain
programme.desc: There is a new menu at the restaurant, which is very popular. There is a long line in front of the restaurant but there weren't enough staff members to serve the villagers the food. Rainbow Ruby turns into a waitress using her magic suitcase and serve tables kindly. // Rainbow Village is full of marbles. The marbles that Rainbow Ruby spilled in her room poured down into the village from up above the sky! Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a paramedic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Gina, Thunderbell, and Choco try to cheer Jessy up but their efforts are of no use. While talking to Mayor Ling Ling, Rainbow Ruby realizes that today is the day that Jessy first arrived in Rainbow Village! Jessy was upset that her friends forgot such a meaningful day to her. // Ling Ling has caught a bad cold and was sneezing all over the place. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a doctor and cares for him.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Behind the Scenes // Paperdoll in Peril
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried about the play planned for tonight. There are no costumes ready for the villagers so it's hard to figure out which roles they're playing. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Singing in the Rain // Mail Carrier Mayhem

Rainbow Ruby transforms into a singer. // Ling Ling is worried because of the "Secret Present Swapping Party" that Thunderbell is preparing. Thunderbell forgot to send out the invitations. Rainbow Ruby turns into a mail carrier and delivers the invitations.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.sub-title: Going Golfing // Case of the Stolen Spectacles
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that a Rainbow Ball Tournament is about to start soon but he is worried because the field is covered with pokey pods. Thunderbell, Ellie, and Gina are trying to pick them up and clear the field but it is not easy since the pokey pods are so spikey. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that he lost his glasses. Then Ellie tells her she lost her needles, Gina her hat, and Thunderbell his wheels. Who could have taken away all these things?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery set out to conquer a legendary endurance course, the course's challenges put their truck power to the test. But as they near the end, a call for help takes them off course-and straight into a rescue mission to save their heroes! // When Rev sees Lori working the quarry in secret, Lori asks Rev to keep it secret-she worries she isn't good enough, and dreams of working with the big quarry trucks one day. But when quarry workers need help, Rev has to convince Lori to save the day!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Camping Trip // Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev and Avery find a stray kitten, they put posters around to alert its owner. The owner arrives at the Gear Up Garage...just as the kitty vanishes! Rev and the gang set out to find the kitten, and Operation Kitten Care becomes Operation Rescue! // When Rev leads the gang in a fossil hunting expedition, they find an enormous skull! But when Molly breaks the news that they'll have to leave the skeleton for professionals to dig up, Rev wonders how he can still have a dinosaur of his own.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: A Gift for Molly // Lights, Camera, Action!
programme.desc: It's Mudder's Day-everyone's favourite day of the year! The Stunt Park is filled with mud, and the whole town gets to drive through it. But Rev can't join them until he gets a gift for his Mom...and the stores are all closed for the festivities! // After Bo shows off his action-hero moves, Rev wants him to star in his film. Bu Bo freezes with stage fright as soon as Rev turns the camera on! Bo wants to be brave and come through for his friends, but how can he overcome his fear?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Tuff McTruck Trail // Lori's Talent // The Camping Trip // Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: When Rev and Avery enter a famous endurance race, they end up faced with a rescue mission to save their idol himself, the toughest truck around! // When the Fender Bend Quarry needs help, Rev tries to convince Lori and Tipper to share their...

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Gear Up Garage Band // First Aid Fun
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Bo to the Rescue // Ice Cream Team
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Fender Bend Friend Day // The Rev & Rumble Fan Club
programme.desc: Rev wants to surprise his friends with a movie celebrating their friendship, so he secretly gathers footage to show they're the best friends ever. When Avery realizes what he's up to, she adds her own clips to the movie - surprising Rev as well! // Owen hosts a virtual review of the gang's adventures with Rev and Rumble, plus all of their awesome gear! He walks his viewers through some of their most memorable moments, from mega stunts to monsters to rescue missions.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After many years of working hard on Accelerator Acres, Tilly the tractor is ready to retire from ranch life. Rev wants to find her the perfect new job, but his ideas are too intense for old Tilly. He'll have to adjust to her slower pace first. // Rev and the gang compete for the title of Best Prankster-except Lori sits out, claiming pranks aren't her thing. After a full day of pranks and laughs, the kids gather for the big party that Lori planned for them...but all is not as it seems!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Anything You Can Do // A Very Avery Day
programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Upset, he leads an all-out effort to convince her to stay, showing her that Fender Bend is the best place to live-despite Avery's protests that she's too busy. Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Green Phantom // Over Easy Does It
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock' Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it's not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Helper Car

Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: Franklin and Friends
programme.desc: "Franklin and Friends," based on the children's book series featuring Franklin, is a computer-animated series geared toward preschoolers that aims to teach the kids lessons. The series follows Franklin the turtle, now older than in the books and previous TV series, as he experiences adventures and achieves milestones in the community of Woodland, learning lessons along the way. Franklin's friends referenced in the title include best friend Bear, problem-solving Snail, practical joker Rabbit, natural leader Beaver, inventive Fox and empathetic Goose. The series tackles issues that include personal empowerment, socialization, self-esteem, appreciation of nature and school issues.

programme.title: Sid the Science Kid
programme.desc: A youngster named Sid, who aspires to a career in stand-up comedy, pitches a morning monologue to his stuffed animals that hinges on a burning question (such as "Why do bananas get brown spots?"), then spends the rest of the day searching for the answer in this hybrid combination of animation and puppetry from The Jim Henson Co., in its first PBS project since "Sesame Street."

programme.title: The Stone Army
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers. Lord Garmadon struggles controlling the Serpentine now that he is without the Mega-Weapon. His latest endeavor is to lead the snakes in search of a fabled Dark Island that ancient texts say holds dark powers. Unable to find the island, the furious Serpentine abandon Lord Garmadon out at sea. Meanwhile, Lloyd and the Ninja are called to the museum to find the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has seeped into the ground beneath the city, and it's brought an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior to life! Our heroes come across Misako, Lloyd's long lost mother. She's an archeologist in search of stopping the prophesized battle between Lloyd and his father. She had unearthed the Stone Warrior, and shares how it was once part of an indestructible army created by a dark spirit named The Overlord. When the balance is altered and evil is let into Ninjago, it will allow the Overlord to return and bring darkness and destruction to the land. Unable to destroy the Terminator-like Stone Warrior, the Ninja cleverly trap it. In the end, Lord Garmadon awakens on a small island at sea and hears the voice of the banished Overlord, promising him his wildest dreams. Garmadon uses his four hands to activate a mechanism, raising a lost land from out of the sea, creating a Yin/Yang symbol with Ninjago. The ultimate battle between good and evil begins to unfold.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Midwinter Night's Dream
programme.desc: When Emma accidentally causes Olivia to lose an important science prize, a furious Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends. But after a New Year's Eve dream, in which a living, breathing Zobo takes her on a tour of her past, present and potential future, Olivia is reminded that friendship is the most valuable prize of all. Today is the most important day of Olivia's life. Not because tonight is New Year's Eve, but it's also the day of the annual Robotics Challenge, when teen scientists compete to build the best robot and win a full university scholarship. Olivia has spent the whole year preparing her entry: an all-new, high-tech, flying Aviator Zobo. It's a sure winner – until Emma accidentally sabotages it and wins the trophy herself! Furious, Olivia breaks off her friendship with Emma and the other Friends (for defending Emma), and stomps out in tears. That night, in a dream, a living, breathing Aviator Zobo takes her on a tour of her life – past, present and potential future – to remind her that friendship is the most valuable prize of all.

programme.title: The Day Ninjago Stood Still
programme.desc: The ninja try to flee from the rest of the Stone Army that has been brought to life by the Devourer's toxic venom - and things get a lot worse when Garmadon arrives with a ‘Helmet of Darkness' and seizes control of the Stone Army. Scales finally takes leadership over the Serpentine and plans to burrow beneath Ninjago City to level it to the ground. But as they burrow, they run into a lost chamber holding the rest of the Stone Army. The Devourer's toxic venom in the ground brings the Stone Army to life, sealing the Serpentine in their tomb, and returning the snakes back to where they were first found. On the Dark Island, the Overlord directs Lord Garmadon to a giant celestial clock. Garmadon removes a ‘Helmet of Darkness', which will grant the wearer control over the Stone Army, and also activate the clock to tick down to when the final battle will begin. Back in Ninjago City, the indestructible Stone Army surfaces and attacks, and the Ninja know the only thing they can do is to save as many people as they can. They manage to barely escape with other townspeople, only for the Destiny's Bounty's engines to get damaged. In the end, Lord Garmadon arrives with the helmet, and seizes control of the Stone Army.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light' that can restore the Ninjas' elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship. The Stone Army and Lord Garmadon have disappeared, and our heroes can see the mysterious Dark Island off their coastline. Fearing Garmadon is up to no good, Sensei Wu has the whole team suit up to begin a journey to the Dark Island. Since the Bounty's engines are damaged, they plan to go by sea. Misako reveals her ancient scrolls state of a ‘Temple of Light' that could return the Ninja's elemental powers, and it could be found on the island. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon has the Army mining for more ‘Dark Matter', using it to build a Super-Weapon that will recreate Ninjago in a twisted evil way. When a storm hits at sea, our heroes are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like starfish that can eat through a ship) and are forced to find refuge on a lighthouse at sea. Inside, Zane discovers his inventor father, the Tinkerer, is alive! Together, they repair the Bounty so it can fly again, escaping a giant Leviathan, and soaring to the Dark Island ahead.

programme.title: The Cloud
programme.desc: A storm is brewing over Knighton. Monstrox has taken the form of a cloud, and is raising an army of lightning infused Stone Monsters. His first target is the new Lavalands Amusement Park. Harmony reigns in Knighton as the Knights pursue their civilian lives: Lance has a TV talk show Axl is the singing chef on the show Jestro is the weatherman Clay is teaching at the Knights' Academy Macy, Ava and Merlok 2.0 travel the land in the Fortrex making sure the kingdom's defenses are ready (part of a plan she and Clay have) Aaron and his hover shield is travelling the land setting extreme records. Robin is at his workshop at the Knights' Academy doing an “independent study” – he's working on some top secret project for Merlok 2.0. It all seems excellent! We even see the Knights new vehicles – which have been optimized for civilian life (except for Clay's.) But storm clouds are brewing. Well, one storm cloud is brewing: the Cloud of Monstrox! Yes, the Book of Monsters has reconstituted himself and is now a cloud who needs a man on the ground to enact his new evil plan. He follows his old buddy Jestro as he goes across the realm on the weekends apologizing for being evil. ZAP! With one bolt of his evil magic lighting, the Cloud of Monstrox turns Jestro evil again (only this time a bit, well, too evil.) The evil duo are back together – and bring stone to life for the first time in the form of Gargoyles from the town of GHOULIA. Now they must gather the Forbidden Powers so that the Cloud of Monstrox can destroy the entire kingdom! A battle breaks out in the Lava Lands, where Lance and Alice Squires are reporting from the opening of the Cuthbert Richmond funded Lava Lands Amusement Park, rebuilt from the remains of Jestro's old HQ. Jestro and the Cloud are after something in the remains and as Merlok 2.0 sends out a call for the Knights to help Lance. Can Lance (with an assist from King Halbert in his Mech) hold-off Jestro, the Cloud and their new army of stone fighters?!

programme.title: The Island Of Darkness
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon's Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined. The Ninja camouflage the Bounty, creating a secret rebel base on the island. Misako says they must find the Temple of Light, because only when their elemental powers return, will they be strong enough to defeat the indestructible Stone Army. The Ninja search the dark, exotic island and come across Garmadon's compound, where they're building the Super-Weapon. The Ninja discover the Temple of Light is hidden at the highest peak of the island, and the Tinkerer aids their trek in creating a Drill Dozer so they can travel underground unnoticed. A final chase and battle takes place at the Temple of Light, as the Ninja solve the puzzle and harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd, who also becomes more powerful then he ever imagined. Their new abilities can destroy the indestructible Stone Warriors. Although Lord Garmadon finds this to be a setback, the Overlord reassures him darkness will prevail, as we end on seeing the Celestial Clock ticking down closer to zero.

programme.title: A Little Rusty
programme.desc: The Cloud of Monstrox and Jestro unlocks a mysterious Forbidden Power. What kind ofhavoc will they unleash? And can Merlok 2.0 and the NEXO KNIGHTS make the new COMBO NEXO Powers work? The Knights finally make it to the Lava Lands – using their various new forms of transport, which are all strictly civilian vechicles – and they must regroup and learn to fight together again to face the new threat of Jestro, the Cloud of Monstrox, and their STONE MONSTERS (in this case, Stone Gargoyles.) But Jestro and his monsters beat back the knights and recover the STAFF OF MONSTROX – which was buried under the ceremonial chamber from Episode 210 (and is now the Lava Puker amusement park ride) – and they get away on Jestro's EVIL MOBILE, which he recovers from the HQ garage. Macy says this is exactly why she's been touring the kingdom preparing everyone for the next attack. The Knights have to get it together because now the entire kingdom is under threat…again. Robin decides he must upgrade the Knights' vehicles and make them more “fight optimized.” Ava and Merlok 2.0 must figure out how to use new NEXO Powers because regular NEXO Powers do make Stone monsters back into stone, but the Cloud simply zaps them to life again. Meanwhile, in the IRON MOUNTAINS, Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find the first of the Forbidden Powers: RELENTLESS RUST. They find the ROGUL STATUE holding the power and zap him to life. Now…they can rust those shiny knights to pieces! Ava and Merlok are attempting to use NEXO COMBO POWERS – with hilarious results – as they try to figure out how they might work. When Jestro attacks, he's able to halt the Fortrex by instantly rusting its tracks and wheels! Robin has his hands full trying to clean all the rust from the attack of Relentless Rust. As the Knights attempt to defend against Jestro, the Cloud is zapping statues to life. He hits a statue with a bolt of lightning as Clay is touching it. Something happens…Clay feels odd stiff as if rock is mixing with his body. Finally, Ava and Merlok 2.0 download to the Knights their new thing: a COMBO NEXO COMBO Power. It works! It can smash the animated statues to dust! They use it to defeat Jestro, but he and the Cloud get away with the Forbidden Power of Relentless Rust. Victory … sort of. Clay talks to Merlok 2.0…something has happened to him. What can they do? Merlok 2.0 is very concerned.

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl in Town
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.sub-title: A Hedgehog's Home Is Her Castle
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs find out that Sonia has inherited a castle. She basks in the idea of having a castle for headquarters.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik captures a Kangaroo named MacHopper, and uses his "brain-wipe-reprogramming-computer" to transform him into a resourceful demolitions expert (Ala MacGiver).

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic loses his memory when Robotnik uses a hypnotic flower pollen on him, and tells him he's just an "ordinary" guy.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A female space hunter named Katella, who is capturing animals all over Mobius for a Zoo, teams up with Robotnik and captures Sonic. To Robotnik's great fear, she then plans to marry the eggman!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.sub-title: Close Encounter of the Sonic Kind
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails befriend a pair of aliens who crash land their spaceship on Mobius. Sonic has to avoid Robotnik's ULTRA-GRAVITIZER (sort of a hedgehog flypaper) to help fix their ship and blast-off back home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: In order to free Sketch Lampoon (a satirical comic book artist) from Robotnik's new high security prison, Sonic allows himself to be captured, then makes a high speed rescue and escape.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik installs a new "obedience microchip" in Scratch and Grounder and orders them to drill for a rare mineral in a tropical mountain. With his Freezomatic machine, Robotnik covers the mountain in ice and runs a Hermit out of his home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic leaves Tails in charge of protecting a squirrel village food supply, when he zips off to stop a dam from breaking. Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder after Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Wes Weasley lures Tails, Sonic and all of their friends to a yacht under the guise of a "Hero of the Year" ceremony to thank Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.sub-title: Lifestyles of the Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Throbbin Screech brings a TV crew to interview Robotnik for "Lifestyles of the Sick and Twisted". Robotnik rampages through the Mobius countryside proving how sick and twisted he is, and Sonic is kept busy doing rescues. Tails decides to take on...

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home, Robotnik finds out, and creates a robot fox family which poses as Tails' long lost parents. Sonic leaves Tails with the fox family, but finally realizes they're robots and rescues Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: An elderly, out of shape, overweight superhero keeps trying to help Sonic battle Dr. Robotnik, and keeps getting him in more jepordy. Sonic helps the old hero regain his self respect and they team up to battle Robotnik's latest scheme.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When the Shane Gang travel to the Auroris Mine, they discover a legendary monster carved out of stone attacking the mines-the Pyritor. Trixie studies the legend to help them locate the creature's home and put a stop to its reign of terror, but first they must confront the true nature of the beast, and its assistant!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Determined to up his game against Stone Warriors, Kord visits a famous Eastern Technician for help creating a new blaster upgrade. Building the new upgrade is difficult...but working with the Technician is practically impossible!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A winter-time holiday has arisen in the Eastern Caverns around the mysterious "Giver," who makes an annual visit to deliver slugs to the people of the East. But when a group of thieves make off with the Giver's precious cargo of slugs, our heroes must ride to the rescue-and discover the secret of who the Giver really is.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The Fall of the Eastern Champion
programme.desc: Junjie recounts the ancient history of the Eastern Caverns and his ancestors, and the events that led to his downfall and transformation from the Eastern Champion to the Dark Slinger.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Emperor has returned! After the Shane Gang failed to defeat the Iron Warrior, the Emperor sets to work creating even more Unstoppable Warriors to reclaim the Eastern Caverns. The Shane Gang search for a way to defeat the new creations, but when the Emperor places a bounty on Junjie's head, they also have to deal with the Dai-Fu and hordes of the Emperor's Underlords.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Eastern Champion
programme.desc: Junjie, Eli and the Gang rally their friends and even some old enemies-to help them take down the Emperor.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang return home to the 99 caverns to find Gateway Cavern overrun with slugs-in Eli's absence, the Shadow Clan have governed by putting the slugs before the people, and the result is chaos! It's up to Eli to restore the balance, but the Shadow Clan aren't as friendly as they once were...and that's saying something. Help comes from an unexpected source-Tad and his slug Pieper, who just arrived from the Surface!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad is still missing after the slug-out with the Shadow Clan, but the Gang have to set off without him when reports start coming in of slugs disappearing all across the 99 caverns. As they pursue the trail of missing slugs, the mystery grows darker when it leads them straight to Dr. Blakk's old stronghold!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad's hypnotic slug Pieper has gone megamorph, his gang of supporters all have Gattler blasters, and Tad's control over his army of ghouls is stronger than Dr. Blakk's ever was. The Shane Gang are under non-stop ghoul fire as they struggle to put a stop to Tad's plans and end the mass ghouling of slugs once and for all.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 1
programme.desc: 15-year-old Eli Shane is a regular kid except for one thing: he comes from a long line of Shanes, each who has journied from the surface to protect Slugterra and the slugs that make the world special.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 2
programme.desc: Now its Eli's turn to be Slugterra's next Shane - whether he's ready or not! Unfortunately, the slugslinging tournament he enters to prove that he's ready, pretty quickly shows that he's not! So when word of this new Shane reaches the ears of the nefarious Dr. Blakk, he's not too worried... yet.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 2
programme.desc: Now its Eli's turn to be Slugterra's next Shane - whether he's ready or not! Unfortunately, the slugslinging tournament he enters to prove that he's ready, pretty quickly shows that he's not! So when word of this new Shane reaches the ears of the nefarious Dr. Blakk, he's not too worried... yet.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: After the Shane hideout is ransacked, the gang trades in one of Eli's prized slugs for new gear. When Eli has second thoughts they go back to get it, only to learn that it's been sold to Dr. Blakk, along with hundreds of others to be transformed into feral Ghoul Slugs. Eli refuses to let his slug or any other get ghouled, so the team breaks in to Blakk's fortress to free them. While inside, they learn of Blakk's plan to conquer Slugterra.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When the punks in the Hooligang cruise into Quiet Lawn Cavern, they think no one there's got the guts to stand up to them so they trash the place.

programme.title: Sprinter Galore

programme.desc: When a tooth falling out turns into a hunt for the “giant mouse”, when the city's sewers transform into Indiana Jones' white rapids or when a trip to the toilets becomes an expedition to a haunted house, well then you've entered the wonderful world of Eliot Kid!

programme.title: Bat Pat
programme.desc: The series follows the comedy adventures of Bat Pat and the Silver brothers Martin, Leo and Rebecca as they unravel mysteries and cross paths with supernatural creatures of the night that lurk, haunt, shriek and dig themselves up in every dark corner of their home in Fogville, a small town that seems to be the center of all things weird in the world, a veritable magnet to ghosts, mummies, witches, creatures, werewolves and things that go bump in the night. Bat Pat will prove that the supernatural isn't always evil but just misunderstood. Our heroes will come to understand something important: the supernatural “bad guys” are not really bad, but normal people whose actions are misunderstood by the more inhabitants of Fogville and what they really want is... just help!

programme.title: Talking Tom and Friends
programme.desc: Things get even more epic in Season 3 as Talking Tom and Friends try new ways to make their dreams come true, making more friends (and enemies) along the way!

programme.title: Fishtronaut
programme.desc: The series tells the story of Fishtronaut, a fish in a spacesuit, similar to reverse scuba gear, which allows him to fly and breathe out of water.

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: The BFF's are a group of teenage friends that together will go through the most difficult situations and become best friends forever! Their adventures are full of hilarious moments, interrupted by a magical character who tries to spread bad vibrations.

programme.title: Ollie! The Boy Who Became What He Ate
programme.desc: Ollie is a 6-year-old with a massive imagination, often lost in his own world - flipping, sliding, climbing and rocket-blasting through the house, practicing at being the master of all things. But even masters need to stop and refuel. When meals or snack time interrupt Ollie's play, he finds himself confronted with the real challenge of childhood trying new food. To escape his predicament, Ollie uses his magic spoon to transport himself, along with his sister Poppy, and her stuffy Nummy, to a food planet filled with adventure and the very food Ollie stuck his spoon into.

programme.title: Pirate school
programme.desc: On a small remote island surrounded by endless seas, a special Pirate School was opened, where children from pirate families study. Among them are Keel, Fuse and Bobo. The pirate origin does not relieve them from study and normal school duties.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them!

programme.title: Winx: A Friendship Sundered
programme.desc: Bloom and Riven fall into a trap by The Trix and strains the relationship between The Specialists and the Winx Club.

programme.title: Bratz: Just Dance
programme.desc: When the Bratz are invited to an exclusive fashion rock camp, they are soon disappointed to meet a snotty ballet instructor and find the fat twin girls who bully them are also invited.

programme.title: Akedo: Ultimate Arcade Warriors: NEW GIANT WARRIOR AKEDO: Ultimate Arcade Warriors / MUSIC WARRIORS! AKEDO: Ultimate Arcade Warriors

As soon as he discovers the gang have snuck in, he challenges them to a music-themed battle. Join the battle. Become a legend. READY, FIGHT, SPLIT STRIKE!

programme.title: Keith Stubbs
programme.desc: Keith Stubbs is a 'triple threat' in showbiz and entertainment. He's a hilarious stand-up comedian, talented actor, and award-winning radio personality.Keith was twice voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly, the Standard-Examiner named him 'Funniest Comic' and he was a semi-finalist in Comedy Central's Laugh Riots comedy competition. The Utah-based comic has made television appearances on A&E's An Evening at the Improv, nationally syndicated Comedy.TV, ABC's America's Funniest People and has established himself as a funny, improvisational comic, host, roastmaster and emcee.Keith tours nationally and has shared the stage with showbiz legends Joan Rivers, Jeff Foxworthy, Bill Cosby, Jim Gaffigan, Sinbad, Gladys Knight, and Frank Caliendo. Keith was one of five comedians who performed for the athletes in the Olympic Village at the 2002 Winter Games.Keith was named Best Actor by City Weekly for his show-stopping, comedic performance as 'Vinnie Black' in the stage production of Tony 'n Tina's Wedding. Stubbs currently plays Rob Schneider's accountant in the TV series "Real Rob" on Netflix.For eight consecutive years, Keith was awarded "Best Radio Personality" by the Utah Broadcasters' Association for his time spent as host of "The Stubbs Show" on 101.5 The Eagle. He also hosted KEITH STUBBS SPORTS on ESPN700 in Salt Lake City and appeared nationally on CMT radio and the Blue Collar Comedy channel on SiriusXM.Keith is often recognized for being a clean comedian, although his audiences span a broad spectrum. One review said, "Keith was funny, period! He was clean but we hardly noticed because his comedy and style are so unique and spot on."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Proud smart aleck Robert G. Lee jokes about performing in a prison, Millennial baseball, and over-protective parents.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Andrew's very personal and fun storytelling comedy, combined with his exemplary work ethic has earned him high praise from some of the best comedians in the business. Andrew is a featured writer, actor, and comedian on the TV show “UpLate NW.” Andrew has been featured on NBC, FOX, and the Bob & Tom Radio Show and is a regular opening act for Christopher Titus. Andrew was also featured on the popular Buzzfeed web series “Truth or Drink“, has performed in over 35 states and his new podcast called “Don't Quit Your Night Job” was featured in the Seattle Times.

programme.title: RiffTrax
programme.desc: Cyborg Cop 2 is the special kind of terrible movie that has failed before you're even done reading the title. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: Push
programme.desc: Hang on tight as a gang of super-powered paranormal operatives takes you on a white-knuckle thrill ride. The excitement starts when a future-seeing Watcher (Dakota Fanning) convinces a telekinetic Mover (Chris Evans) to help steal a briefcase that holds a billion-dollar secret. But to outrun government agents, they must enlist a mind controlling Pusher (Camilla Belle) who could be their salvation - or their doom. Also starring Academy Award Nominee Djimon Hounsou, Push will pull you in completely.

programme.title: Knives Out

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: Charlie, a New York City transit cop with a mountain of gambling debts, and John, his responsible, and frequently exasperated, foster brotherr, compete amicably for the affections of fellow officer Grace, but things become more serious when Charlie decides to rob the "money train" that carries the Transit Authority's daily proceeds. John must decide whether to prevent Charlie's crime or to join in on the heist.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: DJ, an amazing underground street dancer, decides to join a fraternity in order to compete in the the rival fraternity competitions known as "stepping." Now part of an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams. With the National Step Championship drawing closer, DJ must learn to stop dancing as an individual, and to start stepping as part of a team.

programme.title: Crossroads

programme.title: Artists and Models
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: The Family Jewels
